title: Installation issue: php
body:
### Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.0-245-847d5d3
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue
NB: I had to apply the fixes in #15435 and updated the version to 7.4.4 to get the build to work without errors on sqlite3.

I followed @adamjstewart's suggestion in #15435 to run the install with `-d` so the following output is long, though limited to the failing steps. It's certainly an issue with the shebang
